content.rendered:
Staff

Administration

Guillaume Kientz, Director & CEO
Cinthia Fernholz, Deputy Director & Director of Development
Frances Cuadro, Executive Assistant to the Director & Operations Manager
Lisa Dowd, Director of Human Resources

Curatorial Affairs and Research

Dr. Patrick Lenaghan, Head of Prints & Photographs, Acting Curator of Sculpture
Dr. Noemí Espinosa, Associate Curator
Juan Gabriel Ramírez Bolívar, Curatorial Research Fellow for the Goya Research Center

Conservation

Hélène Fontoira Marzin, Chief Conservation Officer
Miriam-Helene Rudd, Assistant Objects Conservator

Library

Dr. John O’Neill, Curator of Manuscripts & Rare Books
Javier Milligan, Head of the Modern Library
Vanessa Pintado, Assistant Curator of Manuscripts & Rare Books
Maria Barney, Assistant Librarian
Michelle Nanni, Bookbinder
Shelsea Rodriguez, Reading Room Assistant

Exhibitions and Collections Management

Daniel Silva, Chief Exhibition & Collection Officer
Katia Azze, Registrar
Jose Puello, Collection & Exhibition Technician

Education, Academic Programs, and Community Engagement

Natalie Espino, Director of Museum Education
Teresa Figueiras, Senior Educator
Ryan Pinchot, Senior Educator
Nathalia Tavares, Educator

Special Events, Public Relations and Marketing

Amelia Wright, Manager of Special Events & Public Relations
Brett Lazer, Manager of Digital Strategy & Marketing
Alexandra Rodriguez-Jack, Assistant Editor & Graphic Designer
Sebastian Rojas-Rincon, Visitor Services Assistant

Finance

Timothy Nicol, Business Manager
Maylene Garcia, Bookkeeper

Facilities and Operations

Roberto Terrana, Director of Facilities
Rani Narine, Security
Javaughn Pitterson, Security
Jose Valdez, Maintenance

Emeritus

Dr. Priscilla Muller, Curator Emerita, Museum Department
Dr. Marcus B. Burke, Curator Emeritus, Museum Department
Monica Katz, Emerita, Museum Department

Mark H. Rosenberg, Chairman

Regina Weingarten
